annotation_sentence: Ah, yes, of course. Um, the deadline is... next Friday, right?

annotation_sentence: Yes, maybe. How to say... I ask for help with design?

annotation_sentence: Yes, please. That would be helpful. Thank you very much.

annotation_sentence: Ah, that is good idea. I will do it like that.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I will. Thank you for understanding.

annotation_sentence: Okay, I will. Thank you again.
